thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Easy to use website. Totally customizable (make sure you measure correctly!). Fast turnaround time. Incredibly well packed--matboard arrived in impeccable condition. Color wasn't quite as I expected, but good enough and adds a bit of contrast to our black on black.
Competitive pricing, too. Overall highly recommend.
